cause.description:
Ozark Mission Project (OMP) is a mission of the Arkansas Area United Methodist Church, organized for ministry to "persons in need" in response to Jesus Christ's call to servant hood. We Bring church youth groups to camp sites around Arkansas where they, in turn, serve people in the surrounding communities.
What began with one camp in 1986 has since expanded to 12 camps each summer, serving all four corners of Arkansas.
1. To be a helping hand to those, who, for financial or physical reasons, cannot maintain their homes.
2. To meet the spiritual, social and emotional needs of these persons.
3. To help develop spiritual, social and emotional wholeness in our campers.
4. To encourage our campers to put their faith in action in their local churches and communities.
cause.mission: Transforming lives through worship, fellowship, and hands-on mission.
cause.name: Ozark Mission Project
